product_name: Tanka Bar Buffalo Cranberry Bar - 1 oz.
long_description: Based on a centuries-old Lakota recipe, the 100% natural Tanka Bar buffalo cranberry bar combines real buffalo meat and dried cranberries into a tasty and nutritious bar you can enjoy while on the go. Prairie-raised American buffalo meat is low in fat and cholesterol; buffalo meat contains polyunsaturated fat and Omega-3 fatty acids. Buffalo Cranberry flavor features tart-sweet cranberries that contain more antioxidant phenols than 20 commonly consumed fruits. Hot Spicy Pepper Blend flavor includes cranberries and a blend of habanero, jalepeno, red pepper and black pepper for just the right amount of kick. Tanka bars contain no trans fats and are hormone-, gluten- and dairy-free; no artificial preservatives. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Based on a centuries-old Lakota recipe, the 100% natural Tanka Bar buffalo cranberry bar combines real buffalo meat and dried cranberries into a tasty and nutritious bar you can enjoy while on the go.
